feed.title: VoucherVault Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.13.0
entry.content:
[!WARNING] This release switches from logo.clearbit.com API to img.logo.dev.

The API is used to display company logos based on a given URL for your vouchers/giftcards etc. The switch is necessary, as Clearbit's free logo API will be deprecated at the end of 2025.

Features

  • move from soon deprecated clearbit logo api (d8a0804), closes #66

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.14.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] This release supports item duplication from the item view pane

Features

  • support item duplication; fixes #69 (745e387)
